comments.text:
FOR ANYONE WHO WANTS TO SOLVE THIS PROBLEM I GOT YOU.
If you and your friends need to add eachother, take a screenshot of each of your's age group, compare it to each other to see who is the oldest, after confirming who is the oldest, do the following :

1.  if you do not have them friended then add them, make sure you all are added and friended to each other before moving on to step no. 2

2. The oldest one will go to his/her profile and go to their qr code,
they will share it to you via screenshot/irl qr code,
 scan the qr code either using 
-roblox qr code scanner
(roblox -> your profile -> qr code -> top right will be a scanner) (mobile only)
-camera to scan qr code
-or screenshot their qr code and put it in a qr code scanner (app)

3. after doing these you should be able to send a trusted connection to the oldest one, the oldest one must accept the sent trusted connection, after acceppting, join a game and test it out if you can see your chat!

Hope this helps.
comments.author: @zx_1nk
